search.query: |makeresults | eval addon="data."| eval dataflow="" |eval datatag=`datatag`

|makeresults |eval usetstats="Yes" |eval notstats="No" |eval tstatstag=`tstatstag`
|eval tstats_count=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats fillnull_value=\"-null-\" count where","")
|eval stats_count=if(tstatstag=="No", "|stats count ", "")

$tstats_count$ `gcp_index` (`gcp_sourcetype_platform` OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:vpc_flows) $stats_count$ by _time, $datatag$logName, $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.location, $datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name, $datatag$resource.labels.subnetwork_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.src_instance.vm_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_instance.vm_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip, $datatag$jsonPayload.bytes_sent, $datatag$jsonPayload.packets_sent

|search $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($projectid_tok$) $datatag$resource.labels.location IN ($location_tok$) ($datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name IN($vpc_tok$) OR $datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name IN($vpc_tok$)) $datatag$resource.labels.subnetwork_name IN ($subnet_tok$) ($datatag$jsonPayload.src_instance.vm_name IN ($instance_tok$) OR $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_instance.vm_name IN ($instance_tok$))
|rename $datatag$logName as logName |eval Project_ID=replace(logName,"projects\/(\S+)\/logs\S+","\1") |stats count by Project_ID

| search $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($projectid_tok$) |stats count by $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.location| fields $datatag$resource.labels.location | dedup $datatag$resource.labels.location| rename $datatag$resource.labels.location as location| search NOT location="-null-" AND NOT location="-"

|search $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($projectid_tok$) AND $datatag$resource.labels.location IN ($location_tok$) |stats count by $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.location, $datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name |rename $datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name as src_vpc, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name as dest_vpc |eval vpc=coalesce(src_vpc,dest_vpc) | fields vpc| search NOT vpc="-null-" | dedup vpc

| search $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($projectid_tok$) AND $datatag$resource.labels.location IN ($location_tok$) AND ($datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name IN ($vpc_tok$) OR $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name IN ($vpc_tok$)) |stats count by $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.location, $datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name, $datatag$resource.labels.subnetwork_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name | rename $datatag$resource.labels.subnetwork_name as subnetwork_name |dedup subnetwork_name| search NOT subnetwork_name="-null-"

|search $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($projectid_tok$) $datatag$resource.labels.location IN ($location_tok$) ($datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name IN($vpc_tok$) OR $datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name IN($vpc_tok$)) $datatag$resource.labels.subnetwork_name IN ($subnet_tok$) |stats count by $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.location, $datatag$jsonPayload.src_vpc.vpc_name, $datatag$resource.labels.subnetwork_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.src_instance.vm_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_vpc.vpc_name, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_instance.vm_name |rename $datatag$jsonPayload.src_instance.vm_name as src_vm, $datatag$jsonPayload.dest_instance.vm_name as dest_vm |eval vms=coalesce(src_vm,dest_vm) | fields vms | dedup vms | search NOT vms="-null-"

|stats sum("$datatag$jsonPayload.bytes_sent") as total_bytes sum("$datatag$jsonPayload.packets_sent") as total_packets_sent by _time | eval GB = round((((total_bytes / 1024) / 1024) / 1024),2) | fields + GB |timechart avg(GB)
|stats sum("$datatag$jsonPayload.packets_sent") as total_packets_sent by _time | timechart sum(total_packets_sent)
search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip!="-null-" |stats dc($datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip) as Sources by _time |timechart sum(Sources)
search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip!="-null-" |stats dc("$datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip") as Dest by _time | timechart sum(Dest)

panel.title: Number of VPC Events by Source

search.query: | search NOT $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip="-null-" |stats count by _time, $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip |timechart count by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip useother=f
search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip!="-null-" |stats count by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip | iplocation $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip | geostats count by City

search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip!="-null-"|stats count by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip | rename $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip as SRC_IP, count as "Number of Events"| sort - "Number of Events"

panel.title: Top Source IPs Sending Data (by volume)

search.query: search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip!="-null-" |stats sum("$datatag$jsonPayload.bytes_sent") as Bytes_Sent by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip | rename $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip as SRC_IP | eval MB_Sent=(round(Bytes_Sent/1024/1024,4)) |sort - MB_Sent | fields - Bytes_Sent

panel.title: Rare Source IPs Sending Data (by volume)

search.query: search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip!="-null-" |stats sum("$datatag$jsonPayload.bytes_sent") as Bytes_Sent by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip | rename $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.src_ip as SRC_IP | eval MB_Sent=(round(Bytes_Sent/1024/1024,4)) |sort MB_Sent | fields - Bytes_Sent

search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip!="-null-" |stats count by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip | rename $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip as Dest_IP, count as "Number of Events"| sort - "Number of Events"

panel.title: Top Dest IPs Receiving Data (by volume)

search.query: search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip!="-null-" |stats sum("$datatag$jsonPayload.bytes_sent") as Bytes_Sent by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip | rename $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip as Dest_IP | eval MB_Sent=(round(Bytes_Sent/1024/1024,4)) |sort - MB_Sent | fields - Bytes_Sent

panel.title: Rare Dest IPs Receiving Data (by volume)

search.query: search $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip!="-null-" |stats sum("$datatag$jsonPayload.bytes_sent") as Bytes_Sent by $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip | rename $datatag$jsonPayload.connection.dest_ip as Dest_IP | eval MB_Sent=(round(Bytes_Sent/1024/1024,4)) |sort MB_Sent | fields - Bytes_Sent
